mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, password, created_time, update_time, state, email) VALUES(#{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.createTime}, #{user.updateTime}, 1, #{user.email})
mapper.select: select su.id id, su.username username , su.`password` password , su.email email , su.state state , ro.rid rid , ro.rname rname from sys_user su LEFT JOIN( select ur.user_id userId ,role.id rid ,role.name rname from role left join user_role ur on ur.role_id = role.id) ro on su.id = ro.userId where username =#{username}
